backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types and state for user profiles, lease listings, and requests with admin‑gated CRUD and profile APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files outlining their purpose and recent behavior changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark color tokens for the entire frontend.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React application root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, theme provider, and profile modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/authGuardCo: Provides centralized text for authentication and initialization error messages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Badge showing the authenticated user's display name when available.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with error‑tolerant retry logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time authenticated users to set a profile name after actor readiness.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard component that manages identity login, actor readiness, timeout handling, and renders appropriate UI states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Incomi: Displays incoming lease requests with status updates, loading states, and actions to accept or reject.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseO: Dialog for creating or editing lease listings with form validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OwnerO: Manages owner lease listings, including creation, editing, archiving, and availability updates.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the application with top navigation, footer, and main content layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with links, social icons, branding, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/leases/EmptyStat: Reusable component showing an empty-state card with title and description.
frontend/src/components/leases/LeaseList: Card displaying public lease listing info including masked code, split ratio, availability, and link to details.
frontend/src/components/marketing/GetUni: Displays a marketing section promoting the Unity Network mobile app with store badges and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/media/YouTubeSho: Renders a grid of YouTube Shorts cards with embedded videos and links to UnityNodesIO instructional content.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Implements the top navigation bar with links, auth controls, and a mobile menu drawer.
frontend/src/components/requests/SubmitL: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit lease requests with messaging and loading states.
frontend/src/components/requests/TenantR: Shows a table of the user's submitted lease requests with statuses and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Combines identity and actor state to determine readiness for authenticated operations and handles actor initialization retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity to expose authentication state, principal details, and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseListings.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching public and owner-specific lease listings from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseRequests.ts: Contains hooks for submitting lease requests, fetching tenant/owner requests, and updating request status.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerDashboard.ts: Implements mutation hooks for creating, updating, archiving, and changing availability of lease listings.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to load and save the authenticated user's profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the authenticated user dashboard with tabs for offers, incoming requests, and tenant requests.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays an informational page explaining how the platform works with steps and ULO lease code details.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing a hero section, feature highlights, and navigation to lease listings.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseDetailsPage.tsx: Displays details for a specific lease listing, including availability, masked codes, and a request form.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseListingsPage.tsx: Lists all public lease listings with sorting, loading states, and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a card message and link back to the home page.
frontend/src/utils/leaseAvailability.ts: Provides helper functions to derive lease availability labels, UI variants, and unavailable messages.
frontend/src/utils/leaseCodeMasking.ts: Utility for masking lease codes by showing the first and last segments for public display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for retrieving, storing, and clearing URL and session‑based parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current ICP-based website plan, constraints, known issues, and existing features for a single-admin UNO lease-code listing system. Includes architectural notes, product rules, and reported bugs used for ongoing fix planning.
